column3: You make it look like it's magic (oh yeah)
column4: Cause I see nobody,, nobody but you,, you,, you
column7: I'm so used to being used
column10: So I love when you call unexpected
column11: Cause I hate when the moment's expected
column12: So Imma care for you,, you,, you
column13: Imma care for you,, you,, you,, you,, yeah
column24: You know our love would be tragic (oh yeah)
column25: So you don't pay it,, don't pay it no mind,, mind,, mind
column28: You're my favorite kind of night
column34: We said it wouldn't be love
column36: It made us believe it was only us
column37: Convinced we were broken inside,, yeah,, inside,, yeah
